sentences.sentence: If eaten regularly, guavas also lower your blood pressure.
sentences.translation: 经常吃番石榴，也能降低你的血压。

sentences.sentence: Dates, figs, pineapples, avocados, guavas, mangoes and mangosteens, fresh or dried.
sentences.translation: 鲜或干的椰枣、无花果、菠萝、鳄梨、番石榴、芒果及山竹果。

sentences.sentence: Like watermelon, red guavas are one of the heart-healthiest choices you can make.
sentences.translation: 像西瓜一样，红红的番石榴是对心脏最健康的选择之一。
